info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 04 at 9:45AM PST until January 05 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Most of valleys and mountains of Los Angeles and Ventura Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday. Strongest tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
